item.title: StructFlowBench: A Structured Flow Benchmark for Multi-turn Instruction Following
item.description: Current LLM evaluation benchmarks often overlook the structural dependencies in multi-turn dialogues, treating them as simple concatenations of single-turn interactions. This approach neglects user in…
